citeinfo.origin: Alberta Environment and Parks, Government of Alberta
citeinfo.title: Sensitive Raptor Range

descript.abstract: This dataset is produced for the Government of Alberta and is available to the general public. Please consult the Distribution Information of this metadata for the appropriate contact to acquire this dataset. Smoothed minimum convex polygon (MCP) were used to delineate ranges of sensitive raptor species based on observations from relevant databases in Alberta, with the exception of peregrine falcons (Falco peregrinus). Additional considerations were used to further filter range boundaries after observation data were plotted. Sensitive raptors include ferruginous hawk (Buteo regalis), Prairie falcon (Falco mexicanus), golden eagle (Aquila chrysaetos), and bald eagle (Haliaeetus leucocephalus). Ranges are presented separately. Peregrine falcons were derived from known nesting locations on natural features.
descript.purpose: To provide industrial operators and government departments information regarding the location of sensitive raptor ranges for the application of appropriate wildlife surveys.
descript.supplinf: Sensitive raptor range distributions have been endorsed by Alberta Environment and Parks.

idinfo.useconst: This material has been provided with the intent that it be readily available for personal and public non-commercial (educational) use and except where otherwise prohibited, may be reproduced, in part or in whole and by any means, without charge or further permission from the Fish and Wildlife Policy Branch. We only ask that: The materials not be modified, users exercise due diligence in ensuring the accuracy of the materials, the Government of Alberta be identified as the source of the materials, the reproduction is not represented as an official version of the materials reproduced, nor as having been made in affiliation with or with the endorsement of the Government of Alberta, reproduction of multiple copies of materials, in whole or in part, for the purposes of commercial distribution is prohibited, except with written permission from the Fish and Wildlife Policy Branch. To obtain permission to reproduce materials on this site for commercial purposes, please contact the Fish and Wildlife Policy Branch.

cntinfo.cntinst: This is the point of contact regarding the creation of, and characteristics of, the data set. Queries about the creation and/or characteristics of the data set submitted through facsimile or electronic mail must include the salutation "Attention: Provincial Wildlife Habitat Specialist; Dataset: Sensitive Raptor Range". For Distribution Information contact instructions, refer to the Distribution Information section of this metadata record. For Metadata Information contact instructions, refer to the Metadata Reference Information section of this metadata record.
